title: 350: Cheating Isn’t About YOU!
itunes:title: 350: Cheating Isn’t About YOU!
description:
The Broads favorite TV host (Temptation Island) Mark Walberg is in the studio today - and The Broads are LOVING it! They chat about how Mark went from sitting in his chicken coop to hosting Temptation Island, loving you, giving yourself space, projection, triggers in relationships, “looking for something serious” conversation on dates, a deep dive into cheating, and a whole lot more!

 

MARK WALBERG:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/markwalberg/ 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/marklwalberg 

***Check out Temptation Island on Hulu and Peacock!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
